source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a festive night scene on a street corner in Paris, identifiable by the street signs and architecture. A brightly lit Christmas tree stands on the left, while an ornate building on the right is adorned with a large, golden sunburst decoration. The scene is captured using a long-exposure technique, which blurs the movement of traffic into vibrant light trails.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video presents a festive night scene on a street corner in Paris, identifiable by the street signs and architecture. A brightly lit Christmas tree stands on the left, while an ornate building on the right is adorned with a large, golden sunburst decoration. The scene is captured using a long-exposure technique, which blurs the movement of traffic into vibrant light trails.

generated_critique: The caption focuses on describing the static scene and the photographic technique used, rather than the actual motion of the subjects as required by the instructions. It completely omits the chronological progression of movement shown in the video. The video begins with a brief, relatively still shot of cars and pedestrians on a city street at night. It then transitions, causing the lights from the moving vehicles to stretch into long, vibrant red and white streaks that flow along the curve of the road, while the pedestrians on the corner remain largely in place. The caption should be rewritten to describe this specific sequence of motion, detailing how the car lights transform into trails of light, instead of explaining the "long-exposure technique" or describing the static decorations.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The video begins with a relatively still night shot of a Parisian street corner, showing cars and pedestrians. The scene then transitions, causing the headlights and taillights of the moving vehicles to stretch into long, vibrant streaks of red and white light. These light trails flow along the curve of the road, creating a dynamic contrast with the pedestrians who remain mostly in place on the corner.
